thread.title_full: Premier inn London - Review of Premier Inn London Euston Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: christopher P
title: Premier inn London -
text:
The Premier inn Euston London is perfectly located for rail and tube networks and a 12 minute brisk walk to oxford st.
The hotel itself has onsite parking but get there early
A costa coffee attached along with a bar and Resturant.
There is a prezzo and an Indian restaurant and shop 2 minutes walk away.
The hotel basically lives up to the premier inn standards and reputation it is practical and does what it says on the tin
